MLModelMetric.name: MLModelMetric
MLModelMetric.description: Represents a metric or statistic about the related model, such as accuracy, precision, or RSquared. Use a modelâ€™s metrics to learn about its performance and to compare it with other models.

BasicMetricValue.description: The value of a basic metric. A basic metric is a single number. For metrics that comprise a set of graph points, see ComplexMetricValue .

ComplexMetricValue.description: The X and Y values for a complex metric. A complex metric is a coordinate on a graph. For example, in classification models, you can use a line on a graph to create classification categories.

EndTime.description: The date and time when the model training finished.

ModelId.description: The ID of the related MLModel.

Name.description: An automatically generated ID that uniquely identifies the metric.

Span.description: The time span for the metric. Possible values are: Day Hour Month SinceLastAction Week

StartTime.description: The date and time when the model training started.
